oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: All for the Hall with Nanci Griffith at the Ford Theater
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.); fund raising; Griffith, Nanci;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Two color window card (brown on split fountain, blue - green to brown) announcing a benefit for All for the Hall with Nanci Griffith and the Blue Moon Orchestra at the Ford Theater in the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10 and 11.
